MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.SoftInput AdjustNothing = int32(48)

summary.para: Adjustment option for : set to have a window not adjust for a shown input method. The window will not be resized, and it will not be panned to make its focus visible.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.SoftInput AdjustPan = int32(32)

summary.para: Adjustment option for : set to have a window pan when an input method is shown, so it doesn't need to deal with resizing but just panned by the framework to ensure the current input focus is visible. This can not be combined with ; if neither of these are set, then the system will try to pick one or the other depending on the contents of the window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.SoftInput AdjustResize = int32(16)

summary.para: Adjustment option for : set to allow the window to be resized when an input method is shown, so that its contents are not covered by the input method. This can not be combined with ; if neither of these are set, then the system will try to pick one or the other depending on the contents of the window. If the window's layout parameter flags include , this value for will be ignored; the window will not resize, but will stay fullscreen.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.SoftInput AdjustUnspecified = int32(0)

summary.para: Adjustment option for : nothing specified. The system will try to pick one or the other depending on the contents of the window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.SoftInput IsForwardNavigation = int32(256)

summary.para: Bit for : set when the user has navigated forward to the window. This is normally set automatically for you by the system, though you may want to set it in certain cases when you are displaying a window yourself. This flag will always be cleared automatically after the window is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.SoftInput MaskAdjust = int32(240)

summary.para: Mask for of the bits that determine the way that the window should be adjusted to accommodate the soft input window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.SoftInput MaskState = int32(15)

summary.para: Mask for of the bits that determine the desired visibility state of the soft input area for this window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.SoftInput StateAlwaysHidden = int32(3)

summary.para: Visibility state for : please always hide any soft input area when this window receives focus.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.SoftInput StateAlwaysVisible = int32(5)

summary.para: Visibility state for : please always make the soft input area visible when this window receives input focus.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.SoftInput StateHidden = int32(2)

summary.para: Visibility state for : please hide any soft input area when normally appropriate (when the user is navigating forward to your window).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.SoftInput StateUnchanged = int32(1)
